dict.string: Copyright Â© 2010 Kosada Incorporated. All rights reserved.

This patch breaks out all the keys of a structure, making their values available as outputs. Think of a souped-up "Structure Index/Key Member" patch.
To use this patch, do the following: 1. Connect a structure to this patch. 2. Connect this patch's "Configure" output to a Consumer patch. 3. Start the composition running. 4. Open this patch's Settings panel and click the "Configure From Input" button. 5. Enjoy your new custom-configured outputs.
http://kineme.net/
A dummy output. Temporarily connect this port to a Consumer patch in order to configure this patch's other outputs.
